events.description: Player #10 (blue/red kit) receives a pass near the right edge of the penalty area, dribbles past a defender, cutting towards the center of the box, initiating a dangerous attack.

Player #10 (blue/red kit) takes a right-footed shot from just inside the penalty box, aiming towards the far post, but the low drive is blocked by a crucial sliding tackle from a defending player in a red kit.

Following the blocked shot, the ball rebounds directly to Player #7 (blue/red kit), who strikes a powerful left-footed shot from a central position inside the penalty area, sending it past the Manchester United goalkeeper into the bottom left corner of the net for a goal.
Player #7 (blue/red kit), the goal scorer, immediately turns and runs towards the corner flag with both arms raised, pumping his fists in an ecstatic celebration.
Replay showing Player #7 (blue/red kit) celebrating the goal, running along the advertising boards, with Player #13 (blue/red kit) joining him for a congratulatory embrace.
Player #7 (blue/red kit) and Player #13 (blue/red kit) are seen embracing warmly, with Player #7 pointing towards the cheering crowd as their celebration continues.
A wide shot captures the enthusiastic crowd, predominantly dressed in red, standing and cheering loudly, with many fans waving scarves and flags in response to the goal.
Several players from the blue/red kit team gather in a tight huddle near the edge of the penalty box, embracing each other and collectively celebrating their newly scored goal.
Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola and an assistant coach are observed in the dugout, deep in thought, with concerned expressions, during a break in play.

Bayern Munich players Bastian Schweinsteiger (#31), David Alaba (#27), Mario Mandžukić (#9), and another teammate in their blue striped jerseys, walk past with expressions of excitement, celebrating a significant moment, with David Alaba (#27) raising his right hand.

Live action from a wide angle of the pitch. Bayern Munich player #27 (David Alaba) dribbles the ball towards the left side of the penalty area, then executes a short pass to player #7 (Franck Ribery) near the edge of the box.

Bayern Munich player #7 (Franck Ribery) makes a short pass inside the penalty box to player #10 (Arjen Robben). Arjen Robben (#10) unleashes a powerful left-footed shot from inside the 18-yard box, aiming for the bottom left corner, which is parried away by the Manchester United goalkeeper, diving to his left.

Replay showing Arjen Robben (#10) receiving the ball inside the penalty area and taking a low left-footed shot towards the bottom corner, which is saved by the Manchester United goalkeeper, diving effectively to his left.

Replay of the immediate aftermath of the save. Bayern Munich player #9 (Mario Mandžukić) attempts a header from very close range, directing the ball towards the goal. Manchester United player #31 (Marouane Fellaini) blocks the header on the goal line. Concurrently, on-screen text appears stating "Neuer Spielstand. Tor von FC Bayern." (New score. Goal for FC Bayern.), confirming a goal for Bayern Munich despite the visual showing Fellaini's block.

Player #31 (wearing a dark blue kit) executes a close-range header from directly in front of the goal, inside the six-yard box. The ball flies into the top left corner of the net, beyond the outstretched dive of the Manchester United goalkeeper (wearing a green kit) and past Player #4 (wearing a red kit), scoring a goal.
